scenarios.name: Create wedding business
scenarios.prompt: insert into bizes id = biz_wedding_uc11 name = DreamWeddingPhoto slug = dream-wedding-uc11 status = active timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create location
scenarios.prompt: insert into locations id = loc_uc11 biz_id = biz_wedding_uc11 name = StudioHQ slug = studio-hq timezone = America/Los_Angeles

scenarios.name: Create lead photographer user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_lead_uc11 email = lead.uc11@example.com name = LeadPhotographer status = active

scenarios.name: Create lead photographer resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_lead_photo biz_id = biz_wedding_uc11 location_id = loc_uc11 type = host host_user_id = usr_lead_uc11 name = LeadPhotographerResource slug = lead-photo-resource timezone = America/Los_Angeles capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create second shooter user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_second_uc11 email = second.uc11@example.com name = SecondShooter status = active

scenarios.name: Create second shooter resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_second_photo biz_id = biz_wedding_uc11 location_id = loc_uc11 type = host host_user_id = usr_second_uc11 name = SecondShooterResource slug = second-photo-resource timezone = America/Los_Angeles capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create assistant user
scenarios.prompt: insert into users id = usr_assistant_uc11 email = assistant.uc11@example.com name = PhotoAssistant status = active

scenarios.name: Create assistant resource
scenarios.prompt: insert into resources id = res_assistant biz_id = biz_wedding_uc11 location_id = loc_uc11 type = host host_user_id = usr_assistant_uc11 name = PhotoAssistantResource slug = assistant-resource timezone = America/Los_Angeles capacity = 1 allow_simultaneous_bookings = false

scenarios.name: Create service group
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_groups id = sg_wedding_uc11 biz_id = biz_wedding_uc11 name = WeddingServices slug = wedding-services status = active

scenarios.name: Create wedding package service
scenarios.prompt: insert into services id = svc_wedding_pkg biz_id = biz_wedding_uc11 service_group_id = sg_wedding_uc11 name = WeddingPhotography slug = wedding-photography type = appointment visibility = public status = active

scenarios.name: Create service product
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_products id = sp_wedding_uc11 biz_id = biz_wedding_uc11 name = WeddingPhotoPackage slug = wedding-photo-package kind = booking duration_mode = fixed default_duration_minutes = 480 base_price_amount = 75000 currency = USD status = active is_published = true

scenarios.name: Create team requirement group
scenarios.prompt: insert into service_product_requirement_groups id = sprg_wedding_uc11 biz_id = biz_wedding_uc11 service_product_id = sp_wedding_uc11 name = PhotoTeam slug = photo-team target_resource_type = host requirement_mode = required min_quantity = 3 max_quantity = 3 selector_match_mode = any allow_substitution = true

scenarios.name: Create compensation plan
scenarios.prompt: insert into compensation_plans id = cp_uc11 biz_id = biz_wedding_uc11 name = WeddingTeamCommission slug = wedding-team-commission status = active currency = USD service_id = svc_wedding_pkg is_default = true priority = 10

scenarios.name: Create compensation plan version
scenarios.prompt: insert into compensation_plan_versions id = cpv_uc11 biz_id = biz_wedding_uc11 compensation_plan_id = cp_uc11 version_number = 1 status = active effective_from_at = 2026-01-01T00:00:00Z is_current = true

scenarios.name: Lead flat payout rule
scenarios.prompt: insert into compensation_plan_rules id = cpr_lead_uc11 biz_id = biz_wedding_uc11 compensation_plan_version_id = cpv_uc11 name = LeadPayout selector_type = resource resource_id = res_lead_photo calculation_mode = flat_amount flat_amount_minor = 30000 priority = 10

scenarios.name: Second shooter flat payout rule
scenarios.prompt: insert into compensation_plan_rules id = cpr_second_uc11 biz_id = biz_wedding_uc11 compensation_plan_version_id = cpv_uc11 name = SecondPayout selector_type = resource resource_id = res_second_photo calculation_mode = flat_amount flat_amount_minor = 15000 priority = 20

scenarios.name: Assistant flat payout rule
scenarios.prompt: insert into compensation_plan_rules id = cpr_assistant_uc11 biz_id = biz_wedding_uc11 compensation_plan_version_id = cpv_uc11 name = AssistantPayout selector_type = resource resource_id = res_assistant calculation_mode = flat_amount flat_amount_minor = 7500 priority = 30
